howToUse: 📝 EDIT THIS FILE IN VS CODE TO ADD/REMOVE NEWS
steps: 3️⃣ Change the title to your news headline
6️⃣ Add a comma (,) after the previous news item
7️⃣ Paste your news before the closing ]
template: 👇 COPY THIS TEMPLATE TO ADD NEW NEWS 👇
